data.event: The land was divided into 137 lots and sold by auction in 1919.
The sale attracted a great deal of attention and raised £58000 (£4.6 million today) but the Mansion and its 150-acre (0.61 km2) parkland remained unsold.
It was sold privately for £11,278 (£900,000 today)and the parkland was transferred to Martley Hall.
With very little land the Mansions fate was sealed and in December 1924 demolition began.
